path.style: vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(239, 85, 59); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

tspan.tspan: Are you currently taking a course that uses or teaches Rust OR have you
taken a course of this type in the last year?

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(42, 63, 95); opacity: 1; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
